author: Guest (Guest)
title: My 2 cents.
text:
Hi
I am also a CRM ISA Technical consultant worked in ISA with ECC as backend. If I need to work as CRM ISA Java Consultant as CRM backend, how difficult it is.If you have any devlopment or extension guide specific to ISA Extensions for CRm back end , plz send it to me cnu_g122@yahoo.com. I never forget your help.

author: Sandeep (Guest)
title: Great help for new E commerce developers
text:
I recently started as a Java portal developer for E commerce applications. Your website helps a lot in terms of understanding how java things work on SAP side. With an environment half setup at my work place, and not able to figure out what purpose the NWDI served, your tutorial with using eclipse and other tools which a Java/J2EE developer is familiar with is just great.

Thanks

author: Guest (Guest)
title: Missing ISA B2B Flowchart
text:
Thibaut:
Great website, with a lot of great information.  I'm looking for the ISA B2B Flowchart document.  Would you post a new copy of it? or send it in email?
